review.title: “working at the Z”
review.pros: Pros – The company has good people working there but upper management is not clear about goals or stability. The pay is steady.
review.cons: Cons – Do not pay overtime and expect up to 60 hours a week.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please do not manage based on fear tactics this only alienates employees and creates an unethical and dissatisfying work environment.
